Package com.mx.babel.employee.service

Class EmployeeService

java.lang.Object
com.mx.babel.employee.service.EmployeeService
@Service public class EmployeeService extends Object
Service class for Employee entity. Contains business logic for managing employees.

  • Method Details

    • getEmployeesByStatus

      public List<EmployeeVO> getEmployeesByStatus(EmployeeStatus status)
      Retrieves all employees with the specified status (active, inactive, etc.).
      Parameters:
      status - the status to filter employees by (e.g., "active", "inactive").
      Returns:
      a list of EmployeeVOs with the specified status.

    • getEmployeeById

      public Optional<EmployeeVO> getEmployeeById(Long id)
      Retrieves an employee by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the employee to retrieve.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the EmployeeVO if found, otherwise empty.

    • deactivateById

      public EmployeeVO deactivateById(Long id)
      Marks an employee as inactive based on its ID. (Soft delete operation)
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the employee to deactivate.
      Returns:
      the EmployeeVO containing the id and full name if the employee was found and deactivated, or null if the employee was not found.

    • updateEmployee

      public Optional<EmployeeVO> updateEmployee(Long id, EmployeeVO updatedEmployee)
      Updates the details of an employee based on its ID. Only non-null fields will be updated.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the employee to update.
      updatedEmployee - the updated employee data (EmployeeVO).
      Returns:
      the updated EmployeeVO if successful, or empty if not found.

    • addEmployees

      public List<EmployeeVO> addEmployees(List<EmployeeVO> employees)
      Inserts one or more employees into the database.
      Parameters:
      employees - a list of EmployeeVOs to insert.
      Returns:
      the list of EmployeeVOs representing the inserted employees.

    • getAllEmployeesAsVO

      public List<EmployeeVO> getAllEmployeesAsVO()
      Retrieves all employees (active, inactive, or any other status) as EmployeeVOs.
      Returns:
      a list of EmployeeVOs.

    • convertToEmployeeVO

      public EmployeeVO convertToEmployeeVO(Employee employee)
      Converts an Employee entity to an EmployeeVO.
      Parameters:
      employee - the Employee entity to convert.
      Returns:
      the EmployeeVO representation of the employee.
